id.description: The unique identifier for the toggle group. This will be used to connect the radio buttons and is required to access the user's selection in the calculations

label.description: The human-readable label for the buttons

definition.description: Optional description of the toggle. Text appears in a tooltip

buttons.description: The individual radio buttons for each toggle component.

text.description: The human-readable label for the radio button

value.description: The computationally-important representation of the user's toggle seleection. This is used in the data fetching and munging
